entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -19.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -26.2°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
